metadata.title: CVE-2015-8035 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The xz_decomp function in xzlib.c in libxml2 2.9.1 does not properly detectcompression errors, which allows context-dependent attackers to cause adenial of service (process hang) via crafted XML data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8035` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.5
libxml2-utils - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.5
python-libxml2 - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.5').
